answers.answer: I would call your doctor just to make sure. Have you had any headaches?

YES!!!! Those are all symptoms of preeclampsia! I have had it twice and it is nothing to mess with!!! I would really call my doctor!! I had two premature babies and almost died with the first!! Hopefully this time around will be different.....as far as you go don't take any chances!!!

question: Okay so i threw up very randomly yesterday felt very dizzy, shaky &weak. I have been having pain right under my right rib almost like its falling asleep all the time. And my feet are getting swollen, i know these are all regular symptoms but could i be showing signs of preeclampsia? Kinda worried!
title: question!
